meanings.definition: The state or period of being a baby.
meanings.sent1: During their babyhoods, infants need a lot of care and attention.
meanings.sent2: My favorite memories are from my babyhoods when I was just a little one.
meanings.sent3: In the animal kingdom, babyhoods are a time of learning and exploration.
meanings.sent4: The innocence of babyhoods is a precious and fleeting time in life.
meanings.sent5: The sweetness of babyhoods fills our hearts with joy and wonder.

meanings.definition: The early stage in the development or growth of something.
meanings.sent1: The project is still in its babyhoods, but it shows great potential.
meanings.sent2: During the babyhoods of a business, it is important to establish a strong foundation.
meanings.sent3: The babyhoods of a friendship are filled with excitement and new experiences.
meanings.sent4: Just like in nature, ideas also go through babyhoods before reaching maturity.
meanings.sent5: The babyhoods of a dream are fragile yet full of promise.
